survey_name: Electric Scooter Sharing Service Feedback Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from users of electric scooter sharing services to improve service quality, safety, and user experience.

questions.question_text: How often do you use electric scooter sharing services?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice question to determine frequency of use.

script.question_text: How often do you use electric scooter sharing services?

questions.question_text: What are the primary reasons you use electric scooter sharing services? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Use a multi-choice question to capture multiple reasons.

script.question_text: What are the primary reasons you use electric scooter sharing services? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: Please describe any safety concerns you have encountered while using electric scooter sharing services.
questions.client_notes: Use an open-ended question to gather detailed feedback.

script.question_text: Please describe any safety concerns you have encountered while using electric scooter sharing services.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the availability of electric scooters in your area?
questions.routing_logic: Appears for all respondents who use the service at least monthly (Q1 answer: Daily, Weekly, Monthly).
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale to measure satisfaction.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the availability of electric scooters in your area?
script.routing_logic: Appears for all respondents who use the service at least monthly (Q1 answer: Daily, Weekly, Monthly).

questions.question_text: Would you recommend this electric scooter sharing service to others?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice question to gauge likelihood of recommendation.

script.question_text: Would you recommend this electric scooter sharing service to others?
